# ASDiscoveryDescriptor.Range.default

**Case**

The default range in which to discover accessories.

## Declaration

```swift
case `default`
```

## Bluetooth options

- **ASDiscoveryDescriptor.Range.immediate**: A range in the immediate vicinity of the device performing accessory discovery.
